downloadDescription: This document is the withholding tax credit form for global customers and partners. This needs to be sent to Microsoft quarterly.
detailsSection:
This document is the withholding taxes credit form for global customers and partners. This needs to be sent to Microsoft quarterly. If your organization is based in India, please use this form: https://download.microsoft.com/download/a/2/a/a2a35969-2d54-4faa-ba41-6a50525eba70/WHT%20Credit%20Form%20-%20India.docx instead. 

For more information, see Request a credit for Withholding Tax on your account (India customers): https://download.microsoft.com/download/a/2/a/a2a35969-2d54-4faa-ba41-6a50525eba70/WHT%20Credit%20Form%20-%20India.docx
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this file to disk.
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.
